basics.label: Business Development Director
basics.summary: Global Business Development offering outstanding presentation, communication and cross-cultural team management skills. High-energy, results-oriented leader with an entrepreneurial attitude.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Created new revenue streams through clearly understanding client goals and objectives. Generated new business through positioning Staples wide disciplines to outperform expectations.
highlights: Increased profit Margins by 50% in one year
Implement National furniture standards program reducing rogue vendor spend by 50%
20 million dollar book of new business

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Development of sales team professionals with annual revenues $35,000,000 annually. Extensive P/L responsibilities, margin growth, and regional strategy deployment.
highlights: Supervised regional division of 42 staff members with direct growth responsibilities of 14 furniture sellers
